Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 24 May 2019It really depends on the places you want to go. For example, a trip to Japan would cost a few times more than a trip to Laos, for example. Because I usually travel with family and loved ones, I tend to spend more. For example when I bring my dad overseas, I am more likely to spend on nicer hotels and touristy things, as opposed to when I'm by myself. My budget includes paying for family when overseas, so it would be in the five digit range.0 comments1
